Name: Clover Club (House-Made)
Ingredients: 10 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist and skewered raspberry.
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker.
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: Made with raspberry jam, this is fruity, well-balanced and easy-drinking.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Julie Reiner at Clover Club in Brooklyn, New York City, USA.
